name: PlatformMadness!
description:
This game is my first ever game. The physics are bad on purpose, thus requiring skill. There are ammo boxes placed around the map. The objective is to kill the other player.

Mediafire: http://tinyurl.com/DownloadPlatformMadness

Controls P1 : Arrow Keys, M to shoot

Control P2 : WASD, Q to shoot
